TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SqlExecutionException extends System.SystemException
Public NotInheritable Class SqlExecutionException Inherits SystemException
public ref class SqlExecutionException sealed : SystemException

summary.span: 在 命名空间中为 SQL 执行异常定义一个类。

span.span: Defines a class for SQL execution exceptions in the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类用作一种方式来区分 SQL 执行从其他应用程序异常的异常。This class is provided as a means to differentiate SQL execution exceptions from other application exceptions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用异常类型。The following code example shows how to use the exception type. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
